divs: Sighting DetailsJust happened to be outside on the phone. I looked up and noticed a white light in the sky moving at a good speed that I could tell was something different. The first one moved directly north before the light slowly faded out. I don't think it faded because of distance. After telling my friend on the phone looked up again and saw a similar object moving faster heading north east. Lost sight of it after a couple of minutes....
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around June 24th 2010
